attributes.action: I would like to See David Essex being nighted for the work he has done
attributes.background: I  have been a fan of David sinse a teenager I watched him once in Bournemouth and feels he deserves a knighthood for his dedication and charity work and the music industry

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour.  

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here: 

https://www.gov.uk/honours
